    "title":"BPLC Applicant Interview",
    "message":"Dear User,

Thank you for taking the time to attend the interview with our team. We truly appreciate your interest in the Korean Language Instructor position.

After careful consideration, we regret to inform you that you were not selected to move forward in the hiring process.

We wish you all the best in your future endeavors and encourage you to apply again in the future.

Sincerely,  
Korean Company Recruitment Team"
}
